keywords.indexterm: processing expectationstitle in a relationship table

section.title: Usage information
section.p: When a title is associated with a relationship table, the title is typical used as an authoring convenience and is not rendered for display in generated publications.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: (without the Metadata attribute group), plus base and rev from the .

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <topic id="topicid"> <title rev="121212">Monitoring the patient following the procedure <draft-comment>deleted the word "during" and added the word "following"</draft-comment> </title> <body> <!-- ... --> <fig id="fig-01"> <title rev="121212">Patient-monitoring procedure flow following procedures <draft-comment>deleted the word "during" and added the word "following"</draft-comment></title> <!-- ... --> </fig> <!-- ... --> </body> </topic>
